name: UnofficialUpdatesFromAWS
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Stay updated with all of the new AWS features and services with this Flash Briefing. This flash briefing gives you updates from the official AWS news feed and is updated daily. For more information about the data behind this skill, visit the AWS News Feed here: https://aws.amazon.com/new/

This skill has no affiliation with Amazon Web Services.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
